meanings.definition: Fixed firmly and deeply in a surrounding mass
meanings.sent1: The jewel was embedded in the crown, never to be removed.
meanings.sent2: The roots of the tree were embedded in the rich soil.
meanings.sent3: The toy car got embedded in the playdough, creating a funny scene.
meanings.sent4: Her words were embedded in my mind, like a permanent memory.
meanings.sent5: The idea was embedded in his brain, impossible to forget.

meanings.definition: Enclosed firmly in a surrounding mass
meanings.sent1: The fossil was embedded in the rock, hidden for centuries.
meanings.sent2: The key was embedded in the thick layer of ice, making it hard to find.
meanings.sent3: The lost ring got embedded in the cake, causing a surprise at the party.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was embedded in his heart, never to fade away.
meanings.sent5: The secret was embedded in the letter, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: Inserted as an integral part of a surrounding whole
meanings.sent1: The embedded code helped the website function smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The embedded chip enhanced the performance of the device.
meanings.sent3: The embedded message in the song made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His dedication was embedded in every task he completed.
meanings.sent5: The values were embedded in the culture of the organization.
